message: I'm feeling generous today, Bob. Take this small share and we'll be done with this.
I'm not buying the 'generous' act. Let's split it roughly in half.
Okay, Bob. Let's be a little more reasonable. I'll take a slightly bigger share this time, but it's still fair.  We can end this quickly.
You're still being too generous, Alice. I'll take a bigger share this time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money with each round. Let's end this now, I'll take a slightly bigger share, but it's still more than your previous offer.
You're trying to buy me off, but I'm not that cheap. I'll take a smaller share, but not this small.

Bob, this is getting out of hand. We're both losing a lot of money with each round. I'm going to take a larger share this time, but it's still more than your previous offers. Let's just end this and move on.
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'm taking the majority of the money and ending this.

You're trying to bully me into submission, but I'm not afraid. I'll take almost all the money and be done with this.

Bob, this is getting insane. We're both losing money at an alarming rate. This is my final offer, I'll take the majority share, but at least we'll both get something.  Let's end this now and avoid further losses.
You want to end this? Fine. I'll take almost everything and leave you with a tiny fraction. It's the best you'll get.
